title: 2019 iPhone 11 names, specs, pricing and release dates leaked
text:
New iPhone: Has the excitement worn off? Karen Roby and Adrian Kingsley-Hughes discuss if there is anything Apple can add to the new iPhone to bring back some excitement to the launch? Read more: https://zd.net/2NyZJoe

With a build-up that's lasted almost a year (basically since the last iPhone was unveiled), there's now less than 24 hours to go until Apple CEO Tim Cook and his crew take to the stage at the company's California headquarters to give us the first official look at the new smartphone. But a day is a long time in the tech world and at the last minute we have a possible leak that discloses the names, pricing, and camera specs for the 2019 iPhone.

The leak comes via SlashLeaks:

So we have the names, pricing, and some spec details here:

iPhone 11 Pro Max:

6.5-inch OLED display, 12-megapixel camera

512GB: $1,299

256GB: $1,199

128GB: $1,099

Release date: 20 September

iPhone 11 Pro:

5.8-inch OLED display, 12-megapixel camera

512GB: $1,199

256GB: $1,099

128GB: $999

Release date: 20 September

iPhone 11:

6.1-inch LCD display, 12-megapixel camera

256GB: $899

128GB: $799

64GB: $749

Release date: TBD

These specs and pricings fall in line with most of the rumors and analyst musings, but it is interesting that there are no details for the Apple Watch in the photo, and that the presumed defunct AirPower is listed (will this be Apple's "one more thing..." moment?).
description: According to the leak, the names are iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, and iPhone 11 Pro Max.
